solution_line_template: Mrs. Jackson had a total of {num_boxes} x {decorations_per_box} = <<{num_boxes}*{decorations_per_box}={total_decorations}>>{total_decorations} decorations.
Then she gave {total_decorations} - {used_decorations} = <<{total_decorations}-{used_decorations}={given_decorations}>>{given_decorations} decorations to her neighbor.
